translations.translation: There are fruits of all kinds on it, and date-palms with their clusters sheathed,
Therein are fruit and palm-trees with their dates in sheaths,
There exists all kinds of fruits, palm-trees with sheathed blossoms,
In which are fruits, and covered dates.
Therein are fruits, date palms producing Akmam.
Therein is fruit and palms having sheathed clusters,
therein fruits, and palm-trees with sheaths,
Wherein are fruit and sheathed palm-trees,
On it are fruits and palm-trees with sheathed clusters [of dates],
Therein are fruit and palm-trees sheathed.
In it are fruits and date-palms with sheaths,
Therein is fruit and date-palms, producing spathes (enclosing dates);
Therein are fruits, date-palms producing sheathed fruit-stalks (enclosing dates).
Therein are fruits and palm trees with sheaths,
In it are fruits, and palms in clusters.
Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]
[55:11] In it are fruits and, the familiar, date-palms with sheaths, the spathes containing its flowers,
(Wherein) in the earth (are fruit) different kind of fruits (and sheathed palm-trees) which has foreskin or shells, or anything that has not sprouted up.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَٱلنَّخْلُ ذَاتُ ٱلأَكْمَامِ } معناه ذاتُ اللِّيفِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: لذلك أعدَّ لهم سبحانه تفضلاً عليهم وتكريماً: { فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ } كثيرة يتفكهون بها، من أنواع الفواكه تقويماً لأمزجتهم، وتقويةً لها { وَ } لا سيما { ٱلنَّخْلُ } التي هي { ذَاتُ ٱلأَكْمَامِ } [الرحمن: 11] والأوعية المشتملة على التفكه والتقوت لسائر الأغراض الحاصلة منها

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { فيها فاكهةٌ } ضروب مما يُتفكّه به، { والنخلُ ذاتُ الأكمام } وهي أوعية الثمر، واحدها: كِمٌّ، بكسر الكاف، أو: كلّ ما يَكُم، أي: يُغطّى، من ليفه وسعفه وكُفُرَّاه، والكُفرّ: وعاء الطَّلْعِ، وكله مُنتفع به، كما يُنتفع بالمكموم من ثمره وجُمّاره وجّذوعه
